name: Cactus
description: A hardy plant that thrives in arid environments, requiring minimal water and care.

name: Fern
description: A lush, green plant that adds a touch of the tropics to any indoor space.

name: Orchid
description: An elegant and exotic plant, known for its beautiful and long-lasting flowers.

name: Succulent
description: A low-maintenance plant with thick, water-retaining leaves, perfect for beginners.

name: Bonsai
description: A miniature tree, meticulously cultivated to create a perfect balance of nature and art.

name: Aloe Vera
description: A healing plant known for its soothing gel, perfect for sunburns and skin care.

name: Spider Plant
description: An easy-to-care-for plant that purifies air and adds a vibrant touch to any room.

name: Philodendron
description: A beautiful trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves, ideal for hanging baskets.

name: Snake Plant
description: A hardy, low-light plant that requires minimal maintenance, perfect for beginners.

name: Peace Lily
description: A graceful plant with white blooms, known for purifying the air and thriving in low light.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: A trendy indoor tree with large, glossy leaves that makes a bold statement in any space.

name: Lavender
description: A fragrant herb that produces purple blooms and is often used in aromatherapy.

name: ZZ Plant
description: A tough, drought-resistant plant that thrives in low light and needs very little care.

name: Rubber Plant
description: A large, bold plant with shiny, deep green leaves, perfect for adding drama to a room.

name: Chinese Evergreen
description: A popular houseplant known for its attractive variegated leaves and low-maintenance nature.

name: Pothos
description: An adaptable vine with heart-shaped leaves, perfect for hanging baskets or climbing.

name: Monstera
description: A trendy plant with large, split leaves that adds a touch of the tropics to any space.

name: Jade Plant
description: A succulent with thick, round leaves that is often seen as a symbol of prosperity.

name: Boston Fern
description: A lush, feathery plant that thrives in humid environments and adds a natural feel to interiors.

name: Money Tree
description: A braided tree that is believed to bring good luck and prosperity to its owners.
